Notification of the complaint and initiation of the procedure: les 
 We notify this complaint as the infringing vehicle holder 
 reviewed on the back and let them know what's left 
 initiated the corresponding sanctioning procedure. 
 
 In case you were not the driver, you are required to 
 that within 15 business days following the 
 date of receipt of this notification proceed to identify 
 to the driver responsible for the offense against which he 
 will initiate the sanctioning procedure. 
 

Abbreviated procedure and ordinary procedure: If desired 
 accept the processing of this file by procedure 
 abbreviated, it has a period of 20 calendar days to count 
 from the day after this notification to make the 
 payment of the amount of the penalty indicated in the complaint, with a 
 50 \%% discount. This procedure implies: the waiver of 
 make claims, the completion of the procedure without 
 need to issue an express resolution and the certainty of the 
 penalty from the first moment of payment. In case of no 
 make the payment with the discount of 50 \%% continue the 
 processing by the procedure from the day after the 
 notification. These must be presented at the OAC of 
 Banyoles Town Hall. If you do not make claims or pay the 
 sanction amount this complaint will have the effect of minutes 
 resolution of the sanctioning procedure. Against the penalty is 
 It may file an appeal for replacement within one month. 
 
 For the processing of the sanctioning procedure will act as 
 Instructor body of the file the Chief of the Local Police

 being the competent body for its resolution This Corporation.
